mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Toothman, William A.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Marion Co., VA [Marion County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Toothman, William A. Patient Age: 39. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound left cheek. Location Wounded: Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Pistol ball. Treatment: Cold water dressings. August 15 erysipelas in wound extending over face. Treatment iodine to inflamed surface. Constitutional treatment by Sol. [name illegible] Time taken every 4 hours. Whiskey. Cured Sept 1 1864. Result: Transferred to U.S. Genl Hospital .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Toothman, William A.
Gun shot flesh wound left cheek
Private
H
14 VA Vols [14th West Virginia Volunteer Infantry]
Virginia
Hospital Number 3586
